<JD_START>
Job Title: Staff Engineer

Location: Columbus, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Are you a Civil Staff Engineer seeking purpose, challenge, and talented colleagues? With a diverse portfolio of residential, energy, commercial, light industrial and public programs, CESO has the opportunity for you to develop your career. We develop leaders and empower our associates to use their skills and talents to positively impact the world through service – to our coworkers, clients, and communities. We subscribe to the mission of “empowering our people to impact communities by bringing clients’ visions to life,” so if this speaks to you, let’s connect!

Responsibilities

At CESO, a Civil Staff Engineer is responsible for organizing tasks for civil engineering projects. One of their main responsibilities includes performing civil engineering work based on project requirements. They use their technical knowledge to actively participate in internal project meetings as well as make recommendations based on research, observations, and experience. You will have primary responsibilities that will include:

Under the direction of senior team members, perform basic site design work on site plans and construction drawings to include site layout, grading, stormwater, roadway, and utility layouts using Civil 3DResearch of design criteria based on project scope and jurisdictional requirementsPerform site design calculations and analysis based on researched codes and regulations to apply it to assigned tasksProvide thorough and accurate documentation of calculationsCompare design options and document findings to produce detailed civil engineering studies and reportsReview technical and civil engineering drawing markups and make revisions accordinglyOther project duties as assigned

Position Requirements Include

Bachelor of Science in Civil Engineering0-2 of years of professional experience (internship experience is applicable)Passage of the Fundamentals of Engineering (FE) Exam is preferredProficient in the use of AutoCAD, Civil 3D, and Microsoft Office Suite

Benefits And Perks Include

Flexible and Hybrid Work Schedule Paid Time Off – Credited to You 100% Upfront 401K with a Company Match Rewards and Recognition Program Training and Development to Foster Professional GrowthPaid HolidaysMedical / Dental / Vision Coverage including High Deductible Health PlanWelcome BoxCasual Dress Code Reimbursement for Professional LicensesPaid Time Off for Community Team Service EventsShort-Term / Long-Term DisabilityEmployee Assistance Program Paid Maternity / Paternity Leave Employee events such as lunches and outings to foster a positive work environment

CESO is a principle-centered organization that aligns with strong service values, integrity, and authenticity. We develop and inspire our Civil Staff Engineers through training and coaching on the job. At CESO, we believe that work should be more rewarding than just a paycheck. In addition to a comprehensive benefit and compensation program, we create memories and friendships through our employee and service events.

CESO, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, genetics, disability, age, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. This organization participates in E-Verify and is a drug-free workplace. Criminal background checks and drug/alcohol checks are required.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
